alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:23AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coffee, western Atkinson, northwestern Bacon, Jeff Davis and west central Appling Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 923 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Fitzgerald, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Pridgen, West Green, Snipesville and Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis
